ad_text: Source One Transportation Sponsored Why you should work for Source One: • $10,000 bonus • $3,000 referral bonus • Home daily • $30/hr*($27/hr base pay + $3/hr premium paid at the end of each quarter) • Quarterly safety bonus • Overtime pay • Comprehensive health/medical benefits • 401(k) plus company match • Paid time off • Paid holidays • Well-maintained equipment • Company-provided uniforms and boot allowances Qualifications: • CDL A with tanker and Hazmat endorsements • Some tractor/trailer driving experience To apply, call us at 1-855-Work4S1 or visit https://source01.com/careers/

Source One Transportation Sponsored THE BENEFITS OF EMPLOYEE OWNERSHIP AT SOURCE ONE When you join the Source One Team, you also will enjoy the rewards of being an employee owner. In November 2022, Guttman Energy, Guttman Renewables, and Source One Transportation united to form one new Company — Guttman Holdings as part of an Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP). When you join the Source One Team, you’ll enjoy: • Employee ownership • $5,000 bonus • $3,000 referral bonus • Local Work, No Overnight Travel • A Professional, Safe and Team-oriented Culture • Competitive Hourly Pay • Quarterly Safety Bonus • Overtime (after 40 hours) • Comprehensive Health/Medical Benefits • 401(k) Plan with Company Match • Paid Time Off and Paid Holidays • Well-Maintained Late Model Equipment • Company-provided Uniforms and Boot Allowances Qualifications: • CDL A with tanker and Hazmat endorsements • Some tractor/trailer driving experience • Satisfactory completion of DOT physical and drug screen • Demonstrated ability to communicate effectively in person or in writing To apply, call us at 1-855-Work4S1
